t.manufacture_order_process_item_num, t.unit_base, t.item_num, t.remark, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.work_center_sid, t.work_center_code, t.update_date, t.data_source_sys, t.material_code, t.material_sid, t.fenpei_chefengzu, t.start_date_chejian, t.plan_date_songyxh, t.plan_date_shouyxh, t.position_xiuyin, t.plan_date_baodan, t.sku1_sid, t.sku1_code, t.sku1_type, t21.sku_name as sku1_name, t.enter_dimension, t.plan_quantity_chuh, t.end_date_chejian, t.jindu_remark, t.jindu_remark_tg, t.quantity_songxs, t.quantity_shouxs, t.quantity_fenpei, t.manufacture_order_process_code, t.jindu_remark_sp, t6.material_name, t2.process_name, t2.process_sid, t2.quantity, t.work_center_sid, IFNULL(t2.current_complete_quantity,0) as current_complete_quantity, IFNULL(t2.quantity,0)-IFNULL(t2.current_complete_quantity,0) as not_complete_quantity, t.plan_start_date, t.plan_end_date, t2.item_num as process_item_num, t3.name as unit_base_name, t4.work_center_name, t5.plan_end_date as plan_end_date_head, t.paichan_batch, t7.plant_name, t10.actual_quantity as tou_gang_quantity, t13.actual_quantity as shou_pi_quantity, sum(t14.quantity) as plan_total_quantity, t18.name as department_name, t19.is_caichuang_quantity, IFNULL(t20.sum_quantity,0) as total_complete_quantity from s_man_week_manufacture_plan_item t LEFT JOIN s_man_manufacture_order_process t2 ON t2.manufacture_order_process_sid = t.manufacture_order_process_sid LEFT JOIN s_con_measure_unit t3 on t3.code = t.unit_base left join s_man_work_center t4 on t4.work_center_sid=t.work_center_sid LEFT JOIN s_man_manufacture_order t5 ON t5.manufacture_order_sid = t2.manufacture_order_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_material t6 ON t6.material_sid = t.material_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_plant t7 ON t7.plant_sid = t2.plant_sid left join ( select max(t8.actual_quantity) as actual_quantity,t8.manufacture_order_sid from s_man_manufacture_order_concern_task t8 left join s_man_produce_concern_task t9 on t9.concern_task_sid=t8.concern_task_sid where t9.concern_task_type='TG' GROUP BY t8.manufacture_order_sid ) t10 on t10.manufacture_order_sid=t2.manufacture_order_sid left join ( select max(t11.actual_quantity) as actual_quantity,t11.manufacture_order_sid from s_man_manufacture_order_concern_task t11 left join s_man_produce_concern_task t12 on t12.concern_task_sid=t11.concern_task_sid where t12.concern_task_type='SP' GROUP BY t11.manufacture_order_sid ) t13 on t13.manufacture_order_sid=t2.manufacture_order_sid LEFT JOIN s_man_manufacture_order_product t14 ON t14.manufacture_order_sid = t.manufacture_order_sid left join s_con_manufacture_department t18 on t18.sid=t4.department_sid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t1.plant_sid, t.manufacture_order_sid, t.manufacture_order_process_sid, t.sku1_sid, sum(t.quantity) as is_caichuang_quantity FROM s_man_day_manufacture_progress_item t LEFT JOIN s_man_day_manufacture_progress t1 ON t1.day_manufacture_progress_sid = t.day_manufacture_progress_sid LEFT JOIN s_man_manufacture_order_process t3 ON t3.manufacture_order_process_sid = t.manufacture_order_process_sid WHERE t1.handle_status='5' AND t3.is_first_process='Y' GROUP BY t.manufacture_order_sid, t.manufacture_order_process_sid, t1.plant_sid, t.sku1_sid ) t19 ON t.manufacture_order_sid = t19.manufacture_order_sid AND ((t.sku1_sid IS NULL AND t19.sku1_sid IS NULL) OR t.sku1_sid = t19.sku1_sid) AND t2.plant_sid = t19.plant_sid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.manufacture_order_process_sid, t.sku1_sid, t.work_center_sid, SUM(t.quantity) as sum_quantity FROM s_man_day_manufacture_progress_item t LEFT JOIN s_man_day_manufacture_progress t1 ON t.day_manufacture_progress_sid = t1.day_manufacture_progress_sid WHERE t1.handle_status = '5' GROUP BY t.manufacture_order_process_sid, t.sku1_sid, t.work_center_sid ) t20 ON t.manufacture_order_process_sid = t20.manufacture_order_process_sid AND ((t.sku1_sid IS NULL AND t20.sku1_sid IS NULL) OR t.sku1_sid = t20.sku1_sid) AND ((t.work_center_sid IS NULL AND t20.work_center_sid IS NULL) OR t.work_center_sid = t20.work_center_sid) left join s_bas_sku t21 on t21.sku_sid=t.sku1_sid

mapper.sql: select t.week_manufacture_plan_item_sid, t.week_manufacture_plan_sid, t1.plant_name, t10.work_center_name, t3.date_start, t3.date_end, t3.handle_status, t3.week_manufacture_plan_code, t.manufacture_order_code, t9.material_code, t9.material_name, t5.process_name, t5.quantity, t5.current_complete_quantity, t6.name as unit_base_name, t.remark, t.plan_end_date, t.plan_start_date, t5.end_status, t.item_num, t5.serial_num, t7.nick_name as creator_account_name, t.create_date, t.work_center_sid, t.work_center_code, t8.paichan_batch, t11.name as department_name from s_man_week_manufacture_plan_item t LEFT JOIN s_man_week_manufacture_plan t3 ON t3.week_manufacture_plan_sid = t.week_manufacture_plan_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_plant t1 ON t1.plant_sid = t3.plant_sid LEFT JOIN s_man_manufacture_order_process t5 ON t5.manufacture_order_process_sid = t.manufacture_order_process_sid LEFT JOIN s_con_measure_unit t6 ON t6.code = t.unit_base LEFT JOIN sys_user t7 ON t7.user_name = t.creator_account LEFT JOIN s_man_manufacture_order t8 ON t8.manufacture_order_sid = t5.manufacture_order_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_material t9 ON t9.material_sid = t8.material_sid LEFT JOIN s_man_work_center t10 ON t10.work_center_sid = t.work_center_sid left join s_con_manufacture_department t11 on t11.code=t3.department
mapper.select:
and t1.plant_sid in (#{plantSid})
and t3.department in ( #{item})
and t5.work_center_sid in (#{workCenterSid})
and t.manufacture_order_code like concat('%',#{manufactureOrderCode}, '%')
and t5.process_sid in (#{processSid})
and (t9.material_code like concat('%', #{materialCode}, '%'))
and t.creator_account in ( #{creatorAccount})
and t3.week_manufacture_plan_code like concat('%',#{weekManufacturePlanCode}, '%')
and t3.handle_status in (#{handleStatus})
and date_format(t3.date_start,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{dateStart},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(t3.date_end,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{dateEnd},'%y%m%d')
order by t3.week_manufacture_plan_code desc, t.item_num asc
